Song.title: It Was Love
Song.copyright: Words and Music by Mark Altrogge © 2005 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [C2 | G | C2 | G] Verse 1: It was [C2]love that brought You [G]from above To [C2]walk upon the [G]earth And [C2]love that caused Your [G]weariness Your [Em]hunger and Your [D]thirst It was [C2]love that caused You [G]to be tried And [C2]tempted by the [G]foe And [C2]love that brought the [G]nails and cross And [Em]love that bought my [D]soul
Chorus: How wonderful Your [C2]love, the mystery of [Em7]mysteries Filling up my [C2]heart,{,} more glorious than I[D] [ ]know How wonderful Your [C2]love, there’s nothing else so[Em7] sweet to me I’ll never be a[C2]part,{,} from the [G/B]Lover of my [D]soul From the Lover [Dsus4]of [D]my [C2]soul[| G D | C2 | C2]
Verse 2: Your [C2]love is filled with [G]holiness O [C2]Spirit, fan this [G]flame Your [C2]love will never [G]cease or cool Your [Em]love will never [D]change O [C2]let me see Your [G]love for me A[C2]round me every[G]where The [C2]shining sun, a [G]gentle rain Re[Em]mind me of Your [D]care
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 it was love that brought you from above to walk upon the earth and love that caused your weariness your hunger and your thirst it was love that caused you to be tried and tempted by the foe and love that brought the nails and cross and love that bought my soul chorus how wonderful your love the mystery of mysteries filling up my heart more glorious than i know how wonderful your love theres nothing else so sweet to me ill never be apart from the lover of my soul from the lover of my soul verse 2 your love is filled with holiness o spirit fan this flame your love will never cease or cool your love will never change o let me see your love for me around me everywhere the shining sun a gentle rain remind me of your care
